rule.description: Windows Defender informational event
Windows Defender warning event
Windows Defender error event
Multiple Windows Defender error events
Multiple Windows Defender warning events
Short-time multiple Windows Defender error events
Short-time multiple Windows Defender warning events
Windows Defender: Antimalware scan started
Windows Defender: Antimalware scan finished
Windows Defender: Antimalware scan was stopped before it finished
Windows Defender: Antimalware scan paused
Windows Defender: Antimalware scan resumed
Windows Defender: Antimalware scan failed
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine found $(win.eventdata.severity Name) malware or other potentially unwanted software
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform performed an action to protect your system from malware or other potentially unwanted software
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform failed to perform an action to protect your system from malware or other potentially unwanted software
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform restored an item from quarantine at $(win.eventdata.path)
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform could not restore an item from quarantine at $(win.eventdata.path)
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform deleted an item from quarantine at $(win.eventdata.path)
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform could not delete an item from quarantine at $(win.eventdata.path)
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform deleted history of malware and other potentially unwanted software
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform could not delete history of malware and other potentially unwanted software
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform detected suspicious $(win.eventdata.detection Type) behaviour ($(win.eventdata.process Name))
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform detected $(win.eventdata.severity Name) potentially unwanted software ($(win.eventdata.process Name))
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform performed an action to protect you from potentially unwanted software ($(win.eventdata.process Name))
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform failed performing an action to protect you from potentially unwanted software ($(win.eventdata.process Name))
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform encountered a critical error when attempting to perform an action over the potentially unwanted software
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform has deduced the hashes for a threat resource
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform is running and in a healthy state
Windows Defender: Endpoint Protection client health report
Windows Defender: Antimalware definitions updated successfully
Windows Defender: Antimalware definition update failed
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine updated successfully
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine update failed
Windows Defender: Error while attempting to load antimalware definitions
Windows Defender: Error while attempting to load antimalware engine because the antimalware platform is outdated
Windows Defender: Error while attempting to update antimalware platform
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform will soon be updated
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine used Dynamic Signature Service to get additional definitions
Windows Defender: DSS deleted the outdated dynamic definitions
Windows Defender: Error while attempting to use Dynamic Signature Service
Windows Defender: Dynamic Signature Service deleted all dynamic definitions
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine downloaded a clean file
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine failed to download a clean file
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine was downloaded and is configured to run offline on the next system restart
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine was unable to download and configure an offline scan
Windows Defender: Antimalware support for this Operating System will soon end
Windows Defender: Antimalware support for this Operating System has ended
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine no longer supports this Operating System
Windows Defender: $(win.eventdata.feature) real-time protection encountered an error and failed
Windows Defender: $(win.eventdata.feature) real-time protection recovered from a failure
Windows Defender: Antivirus real-time protection is enabled
Windows Defender: Antivirus real-time protection is disabled
Windows Defender: Antivirus real-time protection feature configuration has changed
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform feature configuration changed
Windows Defender: Antimalware engine encountered an error and failed because of $(win.eventdata.failure Type) at $(win.eventdata.resource)
Windows Defender: Antivirus scanning for malware and other potentially unwanted software is enabled
Windows Defender: Antivirus scanning for malware and other potentially unwanted software is disabled
Windows Defender: Antivirus scanning for viruses is enabled
Windows Defender: Antivirus scanning for viruses is disabled
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform will expire soon
Windows Defender: Antimalware platform is expired due to error $(win.eventdata.error Code)
Windows Defender: ERROR: NO MEMORY
Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD INPUT DATA
Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD CONFIGURATION
Windows Defender: ERROR: QUARANTINE FAILED
Windows Defender: ERROR: REBOOT REQUIRED
Windows Defender: ERROR: THREAT NOT FOUND
Windows Defender: ERROR: FULL SCAN REQUIRED
Windows Defender: ERROR: MANUAL STEPS REQUIRED

Windows Defender: ERROR: REMOVE LOW MEDIUM DISABLED
Windows Defender: ERROR: RESCAN REQUIRED
Windows Defender: ERROR: CALLISTO REQUIRED
Windows Defender: ERROR: PLATFORM OUTDATED
Windows Defender: ERROR: UI CONSOLIDATION BASE
Windows Defender: ERROR: ACTIONS FAILED
Windows Defender: ERROR: NO ENGINE
Windows Defender: ERROR: ACTIVE THREATS
Windows Defender: ERROR: NO INTERNET CONNECTION
Windows Defender: ERROR: LUA CANCELLATION
Windows Defender: ERROR: CODE LUA CANCELLED
Windows Defender: ERROR: CODE ALREADY SHUTDOWN
Windows Defender: ERROR: CODE ASYNC CALL PENDING
Windows Defender: ERROR: CODE CANCELLED

Windows Defender: ERROR: TEST INDUCED ERROR

Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD GLOBAL STORAGE
Windows Defender: ERROR: OBSOLETE
Windows Defender: ERROR: NOT SUPPORTED
Windows Defender: ERROR: NO MORE ITEMS
Windows Defender: ERROR: DUPLICATE SCAN ID
Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD SCAN ID
Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD USER DB VERSION
Windows Defender: ERROR: RESTORE FAILED

Windows Defender: ERROR: NOT FOUND
Windows Defender: ERROR: BAD EHANDLE
Windows Defender: ERROR: RELO KERNEL NOT LOADED
